name: Jiang Ming 0002
content: Jiang Ming Jiang Ming Associate Professor of Computer Science Tulane University About Me I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Tulane University. My research lies at the intersection of Computer Security, Programming Languages, Software Engineering, and Systems, where I tackle pressing security challenges posed by todayâ€™s rapidly evolving technologies. Iâ€™m passionate about transforming complex security problems into actionable, real-world solutions that safeguard systems and users against emerging threats. Interests Software Security Systems Security Language-based Security Education PhD Information Sciences and Technology Pennsylvania State University MEng Software Engineering Peking University BSc Information Security Wuhan University ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ“ï¸Prospective PhD Students I am always looking for self-motivated Ph.D. students who would like to carry on top-notch research on Software and Systems Security. Candidates are expected to have a solid background in compilers, operating systems, reverse engineering, and strong programming skills.
